description: Returns an array of routing controls for a control panel. A routing control is an Amazon Route 53 Application Recovery Controller construct that has one of two states: ON and OFF. You can map the routing control state to the state of an Amazon Route 53 health check, which can be used to control routing.

parameters.name: ControlPanelArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control panel.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token that identifies which batch of results you want to see.

nested_items.name: ControlPanelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control panel that includes the routing control.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the routing control.

nested_items.name: RoutingControlArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the routing control.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The deployment status of a routing control. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the routing control owner.
